main event: A radar observer and several witnesses reported seeing a strange metallic object changing colors and maneuvering over Dover Air Force Base on February 22, 1953.
interesting points: The object hovered at an altitude of 30-40 thousand feet and displayed controlled maneuvers,Two military pilots attempted to investigate, but one had to land due to low fuel,The object was described as rounded and aluminum-colored,With a white light beneath it, the object changed colors and appeared to split into multiple lights at one point,The identity of the object remains unknown despite extensive investigation and no radar detection.
sighted object: a metallic object that changed colors
witness description: A radar observer, 2 pilots from New Castle County Airport, and a civilian resident of Dover
